info.title: Cardz Lite, Symfony edition
info.description: Bonus cards server-side application lite version

post.description: Returns new API user token (for basic bearer auth). Requires identity, password and device name.
Registers new user with email OR phone, password, device name (for token). Returns new auth token.

get.description: Removes all existing access tokens for the current user. (I.e. logout)
Returns id of the authenticated user.
Returns all active cards for the current user.
Returns an active card, owned by the current user, by its id.

put.description: Accepts an invitation to collaborate. Authorizes user to work in the current workspace.

post.description:
Returns id of the new invite to collaborate on the workspace.
Requires user to be the owner of the current workspace.

delete.description:
Returns id of the new invite to collaborate on the workspace.
Requires user to be the owner of the current workspace.

post.description:
Fires the collaborator from the team. User with the given id will no longer be able to work in the workspace.
Requires the current user to be the owner of the workspace.

Rescinds the user ability collaborate in the current workspace.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace. Requires user to NOT be the owner of it.

Issues card for a plan to a customer.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

get.description:
Returns card by card id if it is issued in the current workspace.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

put.description:
Marks card as completed, meaning the owner has received their bonus.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

Marks card as revoked, meaning the owner cannot use and even see it anymore.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

Marks card as blocked, meaning the owner cannot use it temporarily until it's unblocked.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

Marks card as unblocked, meaning the owner can interact with it again.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

post.description:
Marks one of the Plan requirements as achieved in the customer card.
Card will be marked as satisfied shortly after the last requirement is marked.
Meaning the card owner is now legible for the bonus.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

delete.description:
Removes achievement and removes satisfaction mark from the card if necessary.
Can only be done until the card owner received their bonus.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

200.description: Returns all plans in the current workspace. Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

schema.description: List all plans for the workspace

post.description:
Adds a new plan to the current workspace.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

put.description:
Archives plan. Archived plans are invisible by normal means. Plans are archived automatically on their expiration date.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

Changes plan profile.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

Launches a plan to activity. Requires an expiration date for aut expiration. Can be relaunched with a new date.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

Stops a plan from active state.
Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.

200.description: Returns a plans in the current workspace by id. Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.
Adds a new requirement to the plan. Requirement changes are propagated to the relevant cards. Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.
Changes the requirement description. Description changes are propagated to the relevant cards. Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.
Removes the requirement from the plan. Requirement changes are propagated to the relevant cards. Requires user to be authorized to work in the current workspace.
Returns all workspaces where the current user is a collaborator.

schema.description: List all workspaces of the current collaborator

200.description: Returns the newly created workspace where the current user is an owner.
Changes the current workspace description. Requires user to be the owner of the current workspace..
Returns workspace where the current user is a collaborator. Requires user to be authorized to work in this workspace.

GetCustomerAccessToken.description: New API access token for the specific device request

deviceName.description: Device name is required to distinguish between different access tokens
Device name is required to distinguish between different access tokens

description.example: Get a free americano for 8 cups of cappuccino

satisfied.description: Whether all requirements to receive a bonus are satisfied

completed.description: Whether customer has received the bonus for this card

blocked.description: Whether the card has been blocked

isIssued.description: Whether the card has been issued

isSatisfied.description: Whether all requirements to receive a bonus are satisfied

isCompleted.description: Whether customer has received the bonus for this card

isRevoked.description: Whether the card has been revoked

isBlocked.description: Whether the card has been blocked

Get a free americano for 8 cups of cappuccino

isLaunched.description: Whether the plan has been launched

isStopped.description: Whether the plan has been stopped

isArchived.description: Whether the plan has been archived

name.example: Mollitia id eos debitis qui aut.

description.example: Nobis qui quam dolore accusamus neque laborum ut doloremque. Cupiditate molestiae qui culpa et sint aut. Ut eveniet delectus et. Debitis quos hic qui rerum.
The best coffee shop out there

field: Something is wrong with this field!

message.example: Subject <Subject Id> is not authorized for <Resource Type> <Resource Id>
User with given identity already registered
